ShaderParamDef
struct
ShaderParamDef
ShaderParamInstance

ShaderParamDef defines the shader definitions that were parsed from HLSL by ParseShader. These definitions define the variables that each shader defines (i.e. may be set by the client)

Parameters
m_type

Defines type of this parameter

m_name

Name of shader parameter

m_offset

Register offset

m_members

Number of elements (i.e. some parameters can be arrays)

m_elemSize

sizeof a single element in bytes (used by buffers)

Header

Rendering/Caustic/Shader.h
